thread.title: National | thedailystar.com

author: The Daily Star
title: National | thedailystar.com
text: The double murder trial of a man accused of killing two Alaska Native women is set to begin more than four years after a woman turned in a sto… Moscow-installed officials say Ukrainian shelling killed at least 28 people Saturday at a bakery in the Russian-occupied city of Lysychansk. A… Newspaper heiress Patricia “Patty” Hearst was kidnapped at gunpoint by the Symbionese Liberation Army, a little-known armed revolutionary grou… Hundreds of communities across the U.S. have for decades tried to reduce crime, fight gangs and tackle noise and other neighborhood problems t… The Oneonta boys basketball team fell to Waverly 56-47 on the road Wednesday. The Oneonta girls basketball team rallied in the second half to defeat Waverly 48-42 at home Tuesday. The Cooperstown boys basketball team made 12 three-pointers Tuesday as it cruised to a 72-42 win over Unatego/Franklin on the road. The Oneonta boys basketball team downed Susquehanna Valley 77-59 at home Monday, getting off to a fast start on offense and never letting up. The Cooperstown girls basketball defeated Mount Markham 47-36 at home Monday. The New York State Girls Wrestling Invitational was held in Syracuse Friday with several local wrestlers competing. The Bainbridge-Guilford boys basketball team took down Harpursville 61-35 at home Friday in a Midstate Athletic Conference contest. The Cooperstown girls basketball team defeated Stamford/Jefferson on the road Friday.
